title: FÃ¼nf Sterne
overview: Amelie has just arrived in Berlin to start her new job at the Grand Hotel Lindbergh. She and her colleague Stefan are immediately attracted to each other, but Stefan has a secret: He is the son of the hotel owner, secretly trying to save the family business. Before he and Amelie can come together, they must take up the fight against social differences, misunderstandings, secrets - and against Stefan's girlfriend...
